Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to warning labels on cannabis and criminalizes certain violations of restrictions on the sale of adult use cannabis
Summary: Relates to warning labels on cannabis products; includes advertising, deceptively advertising, branding, marketing, packaging, displaying, labelling, offering for ingestion outside of packaging, or administering cannabis products in contravention of a certain section of the cannabis law or rules and regulations in the criminal sale of cannabis in the first degree.
LawCode: Amd ยง81, Cannabis L; amd ยง222.60, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to warnings on retail packaging of adult-use cannabis products; and to amend the penal law, in relation to criminalizing certain violations of restrictions on the sale of adult-use cannabis
